Class MemoryRepositoryStorage

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RepositoryStorage, ResourceStore

    public class MemoryRepositoryStorage
extends DefaultResourceStore
implements RepositoryStorage
    A RepositoryStorage that maintains its state in local memory

    16-Jan-2012
